Is it recommended to use the `resendwallettransactions` command regularly in production environments to ensure timely transaction processing?

No, the `resendwallettransactions` command is intended only for testing, not for regular use in production environments. The wallet code periodically re-broadcasts unconfirmed transactions automatically, so there is no need to use this command regularly.

resendwallettransactions
Immediately re-broadcast unconfirmed wallet transactions to all peers.
Intended only for testing; the wallet code periodically re-broadcasts
automatically.
Returns array of transaction ids that were re-broadcast.
